attributes.action: Bring Back F1 to Terrestrial Television
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to step in to the F1 issue on its switch to Pay Television on Sky. Its so wrong.
In these times of struggling to make ends meet, it seems ridiculous that programs shown on BBC ond ITV are now on Pay TV. We already pay the BBC a Licence fee and Sky a subscription fee, when is it going to end.
Whats going there next, Wimbledon.
